TEXT.English: Oh, how nice to meet you! I am [OUR_NAME] from the [OUR_EMPIRE]. I love sweet things, and I hope we can get along and be good friends, [CT_NAME]! Care for some of my delicious food to mark this occasion?
Hi, [CT_NAME]. Sorry, but I don't wanna talk right now. Try again later, okay?
Sorry, [CT_NAME], but you need to learn your lesson: Don't disrespect the Apple family! We will be talking more about this later, after I arrive at your Palace.
Great, [CT_NAME]! I am happy we have agreed to peace between our ponies. Will there be anything else today?
Hiya, [CT_NAME]! How you doing today? Anything I can do to help out?
[CT_NAME], I'm kinda busy right now. What is it?
The power of these magical weapons will ensure I will never be forgotten in the books of history! How do you like me now, [CT_NAME]?
Heya, [CT_NAME]! Care to spare a small tribute to my cause?
[CT_NAME], how are you doing? Care to share this tribute with me? I'm sure I can make it worthwhile for your great nation!
Can you possibly share this with me, [CT_NAME]? I really need this tribute! Please?
Don't trust [OUR_WORST_ENEMY], [CT_NAME]! My rival leader is definitely not a believer in the magic of friendship!
Don't trust that rival [OUR_WORST_ENEMY], [CT_NAME]! They are an evil-doer fighting against harmony and friendship!
That false friend [OUR_WORST_ENEMY] is not one to put your trust in, [CT_NAME]! Their plans oppose the very ideas of harmony and friendship!
You really shouldn't support that rival leader [OUR_WORST_ENEMY], [CT_NAME]. They are a villain fighting against harmony and friendship!
Please don't support [OUR_WORST_ENEMY], [CT_NAME]! That false friend is definitely not a believer in the magic of friendship!
My rival leader [OUR_WORST_ENEMY] opposes the magic of friendship! You should stop supporting that false friend, [CT_NAME], before it is too late!
My little ponies could use a boost, [CT_NAME]. Will you consider donating this to my cause?
The caretaker's cause is very important, [CT_NAME]. Surely you can understand why I need this help immediately, right?
[CT_NAME], I could use a small voluntary tribute right about now. Will you provide a small donation to my worthwhile cause?
Do you need some help, [CT_NAME]? I bet you could use this tribute, my friend!
How are you today, [CT_NAME]? Do you need any help? I have something that may interest you... Will you accept my gift?
Hi [CT_NAME]! How are things with you, buddy? I hope everything is alright! I think you might like this tribute I have for you...
I think you might like this new deal, [CT_NAME]... How about it?
[CT_NAME], I'm ready to end this conflict right now and make a peace treaty with you. Are you interested?
I think you'll love this deal, [CT_NAME]! Are you willing to accept it?
Sorry, [CT_NAME], but I'm ready to end this deal. Of course, you could always offer me another trade in exchange... Are you willing to renegotiate our current agreement?

You have disappointed me for the last time, [CT_NAME]. Clearly, your ponies need a more attentive and compassionate leader, like me of course! You'll soon be free to do whatever you want, isn't that great? ([OUR_NAME] declares war!)
